Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This is an exceptional value considering the market rate and the benefits it offers. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
